author: colleen

review: I am not sure if I am operating it correctly but I am not a huge fan of Chromecast.  I thought I would love it.  But here is my issue.  The lag time between the app and casting it onto the TV.  I use a Chromebook to cast onto the TV.  I have fast internet but there are still issues with streaming on the TV.  When I look at the Chromebook, it's streaming fine.  So there is a lag between the Chromebook and the TV when using Chromecast.However, this is a good inexpensive alternative to regular TV.
author: Jennifer

review: Small and portable and able to start streaming....just could find a way to stop streaming without unplugging the chromecast or switching out of hdmi.  Probably just takes a bit more investigating but Apple TV is more intuitive.
